roleset.name: breed together with genetic kin
roleset.note: INBREED-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

example.name: inbreed-v
example.text: sorry to seem negative or critical but surely you mean inbred him with his daughter? thats not line breeding.

example.name: inbred-j
example.text: At my instance Mr. Austin inbred him with good results, and I purchased of him three of the inbred sows, one of which is now in the herd at Charleston, and another is the founder of my Bride family.

roleset.name: generate within, instill
roleset.note: INBREED-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

role.descr: entity in whom something is instilled

example.name: inbreed-v
example.text: His mother the Duchess Lillian died giving birth to the tiny baby which-1 *trace*-1 inbred him with a deep rooted fear of death.
example.arg: with a deep rooted fear of death
